content: yarn 100g = 320 m 350 yards of baby alpaca 75g = 300 m 330 yards of mohair pattern is done by running both at the sametime to create a soft feeling needles size 5mm eu gauge 15 stitches by 20 row to make 10 by 10 cm swatch the clementine hood note when starting the ribbing on both the face section and neck section use two sets of needles or something else to keep the stitches marked it will make it easier when it comes to closing the double ribbing pattern summary this pattern is worked in 3 main steps with a combination of garter and stockinette stitches for the head then ribbing around the face and last of all the ribbing around the neck part one cast on 80 stitches for 5mm needles using your choice of stretchy cast on methods begin knitting in the round until the piece measures 3-4 cm finish on the wrong side now slip 15 stitches onto a stitch holder and begin working back and forth knitting the right side and purling the wrong side round 1 when purling slip the first stitch purl wise on to the working needle and then purl 2 together purl the rest of the row round 2 for the right side slip the first stitch onto the working needle knit 2 together and knit the rest of the row repeat round 1 and 2 a total of 4 times this creates the decrease around the face for the hood section slip one stitch knitwise and knit the rest of the row then turn slip a purl stitch and purl the rest of the row repeat this until it measures 30cm from the original cast on edge finish on a purling row placing two stitch markers on either side of the middle stitch there should be a total of 57 stitches left on your needle place a stitch marker on either side of stitch 29 which should be directly in the middle now the top of the head decreases beginning decreasing with a knitting round decrease one round 1 slip the first stitch knitwise onto the needles knit 27 stitches until there are 2 stitches left until the stitch marker knit 2 together and then knit the rest of the row slipping the stitch marker as you go round 2 turn the project and slip the first stitch purl wise on to the needles purling 27 stitches until there are 2 stitches left until the stitch marker purl 2 together and purl the rest of the row decrease two round 1 turn the project and slip the first stitch knitwise onto the needles knit 26 stitches until there are 2 stitches left until the stitch marker knit 2 together and then knit the rest of the row slipping the stitch marker as you go round 2 turn the project and slip the first stitch purl wise on to the needles purling 26 stitches until there are 2 stitches
